thread.title: A reminder that Amy Poehler and Tina Fey should host everything
thread.title_full: A reminder that Amy Poehler and Tina Fey should host everything

author: Tricia Gilbride
title: A reminder that Amy Poehler and Tina Fey should host everything
text:
By Tricia Gilbride 2017-02-27 03:05:21 UTC 
Oscar host Jimmy Kimmel made a pretty good point about the impossible beauty standards actresses face in Hollywood — a point a lot of actresses in Hollywood have already made. 
That includes Amy Poehler and Tina Fey when they pretty much made the same exact joke a couple years ago hosting the Golden Globes. People on Twitter were quick to notice. SEE ALSO: Your BFF Emma Stone wore a Planned Parenthood pin to the Oscars 
Kimmel notes that Andrew Garfield dropped 40 pounds for his role in Silence that, "an astonishing physical transformation that hasn’t been attempted since every actress in every role ever." 
The 2014 version from Poehler and Fey called losing 45 pounds, "what we actresses call being in a movie." WATCH: This Jimmy Kimmel joke sounds just like a joke by Tina Fey and Amy Poehler at the Golden Globes in 2014. Hmmmm #Oscars pic.twitter.com/kTz0RQrVro
